Value.label: Saving state before power failure
Value.Help: Saving state before power failure. Default Not saved.

Item.label: State NOT saved at power failure, all outputs are set to OFF upon power restore
State NOT saved at power failure, all outputs are set to ON upon power restore
State saved at power failure, all outputs are set to previous state upon power restore

Value.label: Send the basic report
Value.Help: Enable/disable to send the basic report to the Lifeline when the load state changed. When value set as 1, re-power on the dimmer, it will send Basic report automatically. Default Enabled.

Value.label: Fade time
Value.Help: Fade time (units between 1-127 represent 1-127 seconds. Units Betwen 128-244 represent minutes, 128 = 1 minute, 129 = 2 minutes. This value has the same function as Duration of Multilevel). Default 1.

Value.label: Setting minimum brightness value
Value.Help: Setting minimum brightness value. Valid value: 0 - 50, the bigger the value is, the higher the loads minimum brightness is. Note: when configure this value, the value of Multilevel will be configured as 1 automatically so that users can preview the corresponding effect of minimum brightness value

Value.label: Setting maximum brightness value
Value.Help: Setting maximum brightness value. Valid value: 0 - 100, the bigger the value is, the higher the load maximum brightness is.

Value.label: Choose MOSFET driving type
Value.Help: Choose MOSFET driving type". Default trailing edge.

Value.label: External switch type
Value.Help: Choose external switch type. Default normal on/off switch.

Value.label: External switch to be added to and removed from a network
Value.Help: Enable/disable external switch to be added to and removed from a network. When enables this function, triple press the external switch within 1.5 seconds to be added to or removed from a net-work. Default Enabled.

Value.label: Detect load after re-power on
Value.Help: Enable/disable to detect load after re-power on (detect load type, minimum brightness, maximum brightness)

Item.label: Enable to detect every time after re-power on
Enable to detect only after first re-power on

Value.label: Over current protection
Value.Help: Enable/disable over current protection (over 1.5A for 20 seconds continuously)

Value.label: Power automatic report absolute threshold
Value.Help: Power automatic report absolute threshold, unit is W. When power changes above the absolute threshold, immediately report current power value

Value.label: Power automatic report percentage threshold
Value.Help: Power automatic report percentage threshold, unit is %. When power changes above the percentage threshold, immediately report current power value

Value.label: Power metering automatich report time cycle
Value.Help: Power metering automatic report time cycle, unit is second. Valid time cycle value: 5-2678400, when set as 0 report function is disabled

Value.label: Energy metering automatich report time cycle
Value.Help: Energy metering automatic report time cycle, unit is second. Valid time cycle value: 5-2678400, when set as 0 report function is disabled

Value.label: Energy metering automatich report time cycle
Value.Help: Voltage metering automatic report time cycle, unit is second. Valid time cycle value: 5-2678400, when set as 0 report function is disabled

Value.label: Current metering automatich report time cycle
Value.Help: Current metering automatic report time cycle, unit is second. Valid time cycle value: 5-2678400, when set as 0 report function is disabled
